title:
Resident Evil 3, Madden NFL 24, PlateUp!: February's Gaming Highlights On 
Xbox Game Pass - Microsoft (NAS
text: Get All the Market Moving News, Squawk, and Mentorship NOW Get All the Market Moving News, Squawk, and Mentorship NOW Microsoft Corp. MSFT has unveiled the February lineup for Xbox Game Pass, offering gamers a diverse selection of titles across various genres and platforms. From thrilling remakes to cozy puzzle games, this month's offerings cater to a wide range of gaming preferences. See Also: Starfield And Indiana Jones On PS5? Microsoft's Xbox's Potential Shift To Multi-Platform Gaming Let's delve into the highlights of this month's lineup and discover what awaits Xbox gamers in the coming weeks.
